#Marine roleplay standards - Don't openly try to cooperate with obvious or known hostile forces as a crew member. - All personnel employed by the Marines or contracted by Nanotrasen to the Marines are mentally stable and fit for duty. - The Marines have knowledge of all possible threats. - The Marines are not yet aware there are xenonids on the planet.
##Ship modifications - Deconstruction of the ship for materials should not be occuring before first drop. The marines would not immediately resort to taking their warship to pieces for a random unconfirmed distress call. - Includes salvaging of things like chairs in briefing, however does not include the barrels and crates in maintenance. - Includes the removal of supplies from the ship where not explicitly necessary. You would not drag half the contents of the medical bay to the field immediately. - Modifications to the ship should not be made with meta-purposes, do not build a maze or bunker on the ship intended to secure the ship for hijack before you even know hijack is a thing.
##Metagaming - Surrounding a comms tower entirely with reinforced walls to prevent Xenos attacking it without T3s is not allowed. - Walls can be used to cover most of the tower, however there must remain access for other xenos IE barricades.
